descriptor.name: Californian Wild Forest Berries Ice Cream [140 ML]
descriptor.short_desc:
Wanderer Ingredient: Californian berries
 
A vibrant blend of juicy blueberries from California, blended with dried chunks of cranberry & black currant into a creamy, refreshing treat.
